description:
一、回复报刊、杂志上的广告
1.With reference to your advertisement in“China Daily” of 10 May 2004, I would like apply for the post of sales managers.
2.I should like to apply for the position mentioned in your advertisement in today's "City Daily".
3.In reply to your advertisement in today's "Business Weekly" for a secretary, I offer myself for the post.
4.I would like to apply for the post of Marketing Manager as advertised in today's newspaper.
5.Your advertisement for a Personnel Manager in the newspaper of 11 May 2004 has interested me. 5.In response to your advertisement in the "Sunday Journal"of 11 May 2004, I wish to submit my application for the position of Director of Quality Control.
6.I wish to be considered for the position of Personnel Manager advertised in today's journal.
7.I am writing in response to your recent advertisement in the "China Daily", which invited applications for the position of Sales Coordinator.
二、指出是某人告知
1.I am writing to you at the suggestion of Anne Price, who indicated that you might be interested in someone with my background and qualifications.
2.Mr.Jack Pages suggested that I write to you in connection with an opening for a computer programmer in your department.
3.I would like to apply for the position of Human Resources Manager which Mr. Jerome tells me is begin staffed.
三、如果不想告诉对方你是如何得到消息的
1.I understand that you may have an opening for an accountant.
2.I have been given to understand that you are currently recruiting for a vacancy in the Marketing Department.
3.I wish to be considered for the position of Health and Safety Officer that I understand is currently being staffed.
四、如果你不知道对方是否空缺
1.I am writing to enquire about job opportunities for senior clerks.
2.I am writing in the hope that you may have openings for Production Managers.
3.I would like to be considered for a position as a typist in your department.
五、介绍自己的情况
1.For the past five years, I have been working as a sales executive for DA Ltd.
2.I am thirty years of age. Since graduating I have worked for seven year in a training center of DA Ltd., where I am at present employed.
3.I have had fives year's experience with a company as a Marketing Manager.
六、对个人能力的描述
1.I am able to take dictation in French and translate them rapidly into English.
2.I have a fair knowledge of shorthand, and can write one hundred and twenty words per minute.七、表示寄信寄送物品
3.Enclosed please find a curriculum vitae and a photo.
4.I enclose a curriculum vitae and a photo.
5.I am enclosing my curriculum vitae together with my photograph.
七、解释离开原先职务的原因
1.I left the position with the desire of improving my position.
2.I am desirous of leaving the employment in order to have more responsibility.
3.My reason for leaving my present employment is that I am desirous of getting broad experience in trading.
八、结束语
1.I trust that you will give this application your favorable consideration.
2.I hope you will consider my application and look forward to hearing from you.
3.I would be pleased to attend an interview at any time which suits you.
